import React from 'react'; import './Header.css'; import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search'; import ShoppingBasketIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ShoppingBasket'; import DehazeIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Dehaze'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import { useStateValue } from './StateProvider'; function Header() { const[{basket},dispatch]=useStateValue(); return (
Hello Guest Sign in
Returns &Orders
Your Prime
{basket?.length}
) } export default Header
